name: shadow-query
description: micro-library for writing high performance vanilla web components

scripts.build: npm run-script build-doc; npm run-script uglify; cp shadowQuery.mjs index.mjs
scripts.build-doc: cp shadowQuery.mjs s.js; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md --separators -f s.js > documentation/api/README.md; rm s.js
scripts.stop: ps aux | grep 'shadow-query/node_modules/.bin/serve' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill
scripts.test: npm start; sleep 2; ./node_modules/.bin/mocha-headless-chrome -f http://localhost:5000/test/test.html; sleep 5; npm stop
